events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving rear-end collision on a busy street. Initial details for claim creation provided.
Claim was categorised under Auto Accident as the incident involved the insured vehicle being damaged in a collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle this auto accident claim to provide dedicated support.
Acknowledgment sent to customer confirming receipt of claim and outlining next steps in the evaluation process.
Requested vehicle registration, photos of damage, police report, and insurance policy documents for claim validation.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report and multiple photos showing the extent of the damage.
Investigation team initiated assessment of the accident circumstances and damage severity based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded with verification of liability, damage extent, and validation of claim details provided by customer.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and associated expenses following investigation.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt investigation and the fairness of the settlement offer proposed.
Claim officially approved for payment following acceptance of settlement terms by the insured party.
Payment disbursed to customerâ€™s bank account for the agreed settlement amount related to the auto accident claim.
Claim was formally closed after successful payment and no further follow-up required from either party.
